attributes.action: Put fence at west thurrock cemetery and stop having a walkthrough to park
attributes.background: Grave's always getting vandalised by people  because it have a walkthrough to park and no fance.

rejection.details:
This cemetery is the responsibility of the local authority, whose contact details can be found on the following link: 

https://www.thurrock.gov.uk/deaths/cemeteries-and-churchyards
